meanings.definition: To have filled a bushel with something.
meanings.sent1: She busheled the apples into the basket.
meanings.sent2: The farmer busheled the corn into the storage bin.
meanings.sent3: The kids busheled sand into the bucket for their sandcastle.
meanings.sent4: He busheled his backpack with books for school.
meanings.sent5: The chef busheled the flour into the mixing bowl for the cake.

meanings.definition: To have measured or estimated something in bushels.
meanings.sent1: He busheled the potatoes to sell at the market.
meanings.sent2: The farmer busheled the wheat before selling it.
meanings.sent3: She busheled the toys to donate to the charity.
meanings.sent4: The baker busheled the grains for the bread recipe.
meanings.sent5: They busheled the fruits to distribute among the villagers.
